summary: A door to door salesman of dentist's appliances encounters beautiful well-endowed nude women everywhere he goes.
cast: Bill Teas|Ann Peters|Marilyn Wesley|Michele Roberts|Dawn Danielle|Don Cochran|Don Couch|Althea Currier|Peter A. DeCenzie|G. Ferrus|Mikki France|Earl Leaf|Monica Liljistrand|Donna Long|Russ Meyer|E.M. Nathanson|Paula Parker|Alicyn Sanborn|Doris Sanders|Paul Morton Smith|June Wilkinson
title: The Immoral Mr. Teas
